answers.answer: I have been with baby #2 but we're on #4 and professionals now. :) I recommend a good book limit internet cause that can be depressing at times and rest!! Good luck!!

Thank you so much! I had bleeding at 11 weeks and they are worried about the placenta and where it will attach...I had a stroke 3 months ago and on lovanox shots....we have a lot going on! It's good to hear you had a positive ending!

I have been hospitalized and put on bedrest since I was 25 weeks until 34 weeks for severe preeclampsia. They will induce me at 34 weeks. Just relax and don't sweat it. Nothing you can really do. Keep a book with you, watch dinner movies, etc. It gets boring, but what can I do but count down the days until my little princess is here... I will have 4 more weeks as of 5/6

question: I am 11 weeks pregnant and was put on bed rest now until at least 17 weeks. Anyone else on bedrest?
title: bedrest
